## PermanentStorage.get() method

Gets value that was stored with 'name' from permanent storage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get<TResult>(name: string): TResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name with which was value stored |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TResult`
